attributes.action: publish all e - petitions as some are refused publication unfairly especially those from health groups
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Suspect someone with a  political agenda is delegating worthwhile petitions to  the scrapheap as many perfectly OK .If language not OK assist. 
I can see the point if racist and discriminatory but should have 3 objective persons not connected to decide.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
